nodes.documentation: @title Contract for storing blockchain parameters that can be set by governance.
nodes.name: BlockchainParameters
initialize
setMinimumClientVersion

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the block gas limit.
@param gasLimit New block gas limit.
nodes.name: setBlockGasLimit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.
@param gas Intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.
nodes.name: setIntrinsicGasForAlternativeFeeCurrency

nodes.documentation:
@notice Query minimum client version.
@return Returns major, minor, and patch version numbers.
nodes.name: getMinimumClientVersion

nodes.documentation: @title Contract for storing blockchain parameters that can be set by governance.
nodes.name: BlockchainParameters
initialize
setMinimumClientVersion

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the block gas limit.
@param gasLimit New block gas limit.
nodes.name: setBlockGasLimit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.
@param gas Intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.
nodes.name: setIntrinsicGasForAlternativeFeeCurrency

nodes.documentation:
@notice Query minimum client version.
@return Returns major, minor, and patch version numbers.
nodes.name: getMinimumClientVersion

getMinimumClientVersion().return: Returns major, minor, and patch version numbers.

params._gasForNonGoldCurrencies: Intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.
params.major: Minimum client version that can be used in the chain, major version.
params.minor: Minimum client version that can be used in the chain, minor version.
params.patch: Minimum client version that can be used in the chain, patch level.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.gas: Intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.

setMinimumClientVersion(uint256,uint256,.details: For example if the version is 1.9.2, 1 is the major version, 9 is minor, and 2 is the patch level.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Contract for storing blockchain parameters that can be set by governance.

initialize(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

setIntrinsicGasForAlternativeFeeCurrency.notice: Sets the intrinsic gas for non-gold gas currencies.
